name: Dinari ADBE
description: The Dinari dShare token for Adobe Inc. stock (ADBE.d) represents a 1:1 backed token tied to shares of Adobe. Each ADBE.d token is fully backed by a corresponding share held securely in a transparent treasury vault. This tokenized version of Adobeâ€™s equity leverages blockchain technology to provide enhanced accessibility, offering benefits like 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlements, and seamless transferability. By bringing real-world equities to the blockchain, Dinari aims to make investing in top companies like Adobe more efficient and inclusive.
